title: The Goblin Menace
description: A classic D&D adventure where the hero must investigate increased goblin activity in the region and stop their raids on innocent travelers.

locations.name: The Wandering Griffin Tavern
locations.description: A cozy tavern at the crossroads, frequented by travelers and merchants. The air is thick with pipe smoke and the smell of hearty stew. A large fireplace crackles in the corner.

descriptions.first_visit: A cozy tavern at the crossroads, frequented by travelers and merchants. The air is thick with pipe smoke and the smell of hearty stew. A large fireplace crackles in the corner. The barkeep looks up as you enter, worry etched on his face.
descriptions.return_visit: The familiar warmth of the Wandering Griffin welcomes you back. Gareth nods in recognition as you enter.
descriptions.cleared: The tavern buzzes with celebration. Word of your victory over the goblins has spread, and grateful merchants raise their tankards in salute.

npcs.name: Gareth the Barkeep
npcs.description: A stout human with a graying beard and worried expression.
dialogue_hints: Mentions increased goblin raids on the forest road
His brother's caravan was attacked last week
Offers a reward for dealing with the goblins
Suggests the goblins have a cave hideout in the Darkwood

npcs.name: Mira the Merchant
npcs.description: A halfling trader who survived a recent goblin attack.
dialogue_hints: Mentions seeing a larger hobgoblin leading them
Lost valuable goods in the attack
Warns about wolves working with the goblins

connections.description: A well-worn road leads out of town toward the Darkwood Forest

events: Optional: Overhear rumors about a goblin boss
environmental_features: Large fireplace provides warmth and light

locations.name: Darkwood Forest Path
locations.description: A winding dirt path through dense forest. Tall trees block much of the sunlight, creating deep shadows. The path shows signs of recent traffic and struggle.

descriptions.first_visit: A winding dirt path through dense forest. Tall trees block much of the sunlight, creating deep shadows. The path shows signs of recent traffic and struggle. You notice broken wagon wheels and scattered goods along the roadside.
descriptions.return_visit: The forest path seems less menacing now that you know what lurks within. The shadows hold fewer mysteries.
descriptions.cleared: The forest path is peaceful now. Birds have returned to the trees, and merchants travel without fear.

encounters.description: Discover overturned merchant cart with goblin arrows protruding from its sides
Track the goblins back to their hideout following footprints and broken branches
Goblin ambush from the underbrush!
A wounded merchant hiding in the woods calls out for help

connections.description: The road back to the tavern
A hidden trail leads deeper into the forest toward a rocky hillside

requirements.description: Must successfully track the goblins or learn location from NPC

connections.description: A barely visible path branches off through the undergrowth

environmental_features: Multiple paths branch off the main road
Signs of recent combat (blood, broken weapons)
Goblin tracks leading deeper into the forest

secrets.description: A merchant's hidden emergency cache buried under a marked tree
secrets.reward: 50 gold pieces and a Healing Potion

locations.name: Hidden Forest Clearing
locations.description: A peaceful glade hidden off the main path. Sunlight filters through the canopy, illuminating wildflowers. An ancient stone shrine stands in the center.

descriptions.first_visit: You push through the undergrowth to discover a peaceful glade hidden from the main path. Sunlight filters through the canopy, illuminating wildflowers. An ancient stone shrine stands in the center, covered in moss and vines.
descriptions.return_visit: The peaceful clearing welcomes you back. The shrine seems to glow faintly in recognition.

encounters.description: Investigate the ancient shrine to nature spirits
rewards: Blessing of the nature spirits (+1 to next saving throw)

encounters.description: A natural spring with healing properties bubbles up near the shrine
A dire wolf, guardian of the shrine, attacks if the party makes too much noise

connections.description: The narrow path back to the main forest road

environmental_features: Ancient stone shrine covered in moss
Peaceful atmosphere grants advantage on rest

secrets.description: A hidden compartment behind the shrine containing ancient offerings
secrets.reward: 2 Healing Potions and a silver holy symbol

secrets.description: Elvish runes on the shrine reveal a goblin weakness - they fear bright light
secrets.reward: Knowledge that goblins have disadvantage in bright light

locations.name: Goblin Cave Entrance
locations.description: A dark opening in a rocky hillside, partially hidden by hanging vines and brush. Bones and refuse litter the area. The stench of goblin habitation is strong.

descriptions.first_visit: You find a dark opening in a rocky hillside, partially hidden by hanging vines and brush. Bones and refuse litter the area. The stench of goblin habitation is overwhelming. You can hear faint sounds echoing from within.
descriptions.return_visit: The cave entrance looms before you once again. The guards seem more alert this time.
descriptions.cleared: The cave entrance is now abandoned. Without the goblins, nature is already beginning to reclaim the area.

encounters.description: Goblin sentries guard the entrance
A concealed pit trap covered with branches and leaves
Attempt to sneak past the guards

connections.description: The trail back through the forest
A dark passage leads deeper into the cave

requirements.description: Defeat or bypass the entrance guards

locations.name: Goblin Cave Tunnels
locations.description: Twisting natural tunnels carved wider by goblin tools. The walls are damp and the air is musty. Torches provide flickering light at irregular intervals.

descriptions.first_visit: You enter twisting natural tunnels that have been carved wider by crude goblin tools. The walls are damp and the air is musty. Torches provide flickering light at irregular intervals. Multiple passages branch off in different directions.
descriptions.return_visit: The maze-like tunnels are becoming more familiar to you.
descriptions.cleared: The tunnels are eerily quiet without the constant chatter of goblins.

encounters.description: A goblin patrol making their rounds
Navigate the maze-like tunnels to find your way
A tripwire connected to alarm bells

connections.description: The passage back to the cave entrance
Sounds of goblin chatter come from this wider tunnel
A side passage with a wooden door
An ornate passage leading to a larger chamber

requirements.description: Requires the boss chamber key from the hobgoblin lieutenant

secrets.description: A hidden passage that bypasses the goblin commons
secrets.reward: Direct access to boss chamber area

locations.name: Goblin Common Area
locations.description: A larger cavern where the goblins eat and sleep. Crude furniture made from stolen goods fills the space. A cooking fire smolders in the center.

descriptions.first_visit: You enter a larger cavern filled with the sounds and smells of goblin habitation. Crude furniture made from stolen goods fills the space. A cooking fire smolders in the center, casting dancing shadows on the walls.
descriptions.return_visit: The goblin commons area, as chaotic as before.
descriptions.cleared: The common area is now empty, the fire reduced to cold ashes.

encounters.description: The goblin inhabitants attack intruders!
Possible negotiation if approached carefully and someone speaks Goblin
Smoke from the cooking fire provides light obscurement

locations.name: Storage Chamber
locations.description: A side chamber filled with crates, barrels, and sacks of stolen goods. The goblins' ill-gotten gains are piled haphazardly.

descriptions.first_visit: You discover a side chamber filled with crates, barrels, and sacks of stolen goods. The goblins' ill-gotten gains are piled haphazardly. Spider webs cover one corner of the room.
descriptions.return_visit: The storage room, still filled with stolen goods.

encounters.description: A poisoned dart trap protects the main treasure chest
Giant spiders drop from the webbed corner if disturbed

secrets.description: A false bottom in one crate hides the most valuable items

locations.name: Goblin Boss Chamber
locations.description: The largest cavern, decorated with skulls and crude tapestries. A throne made of bones and stolen goods dominates one end. This is where the goblin boss holds court.

descriptions.first_visit: You enter the largest cavern you've seen, decorated with skulls and crude tapestries depicting goblin victories. A throne made of bones and stolen goods dominates one end. The goblin boss sits upon it, sneering at your arrival.
descriptions.return_visit: The boss chamber, scene of your previous battle.
descriptions.cleared: The boss chamber is now empty, the throne of bones toppled and broken.

encounters.description: The final confrontation with the goblin boss and his minions!
The boss may attempt to negotiate or trick the party before combat
Stalactites can be knocked down during combat

environmental_features: Throne of bones and stolen goods

secrets.description: The boss's personal treasure hidden behind the throne

victory_conditions: Optional: Discover plans for larger raid

quests.name: Investigate the Goblin Threat
quests.description: Learn about the increased goblin activity and discover their hideout

objectives.description: Speak with Gareth the Barkeep about the goblin problem
Gather information from other tavern patrons
Accept the quest to deal with the goblins

quests.rewards_description: 50 gold pieces and the gratitude of local merchants

quests.name: Find the Goblin Lair
quests.description: Track the goblins through the forest to locate their hideout

objectives.description: Search the forest path for signs of goblin activity
Follow the goblin tracks to their lair
Survive the goblin ambush on the forest path

quests.rewards_description: Experience and any loot from defeated goblins

quests.name: Infiltrate the Goblin Cave
quests.description: Enter the goblin cave and navigate its dangers

objectives.description: Navigate through the cave tunnel system
Obtain the key to the boss chamber

quests.rewards_description: Access to the goblin boss chamber

quests.name: Defeat the Goblin Boss
quests.description: Confront and defeat the goblin boss to end the threat

objectives.description: Face the goblin boss in combat
Free any prisoners held by the goblins

quests.rewards_description: 100+ gold pieces, possible magic item, hero status

quests.name: Return Victorious
quests.description: Return to the tavern with news of your victory

objectives.description: Travel back to the Wandering Griffin Tavern

acts.name: The Goblin Cave
completion_requirements: Obtain access to the boss chamber

acts.name: Boss Battle
completion_requirements: Defeat the goblin boss and return to the tavern

random_encounters.description: A merchant in distress needs help
Meet a friendly ranger who provides information
